subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Mayweather, 38, has chosen a less than inspiring opponent for what he says will be his farewell fight: Andre Berto, 31, who is 3-3 in his last six bouts.
snippet: Mayweather, 38, has chosen a less than inspiring opponent for what he says will be his farewell fight: Andre Berto, 31, who is 3-3 in his last six bouts.
